snippet: The local news network has been a personal passion of AOL’s chief executive, Tim Armstrong, but also something of an albatross.
lead_paragraph: The local news network has been a personal passion of AOL’s chief executive, Tim Armstrong, but also something of an albatross.

headline.main: AOL Finds a Partner to Run Its Troubled Patch Division
headline.print_headline: AOL Finds a Partner to Run Its Troubled Patch Division
